ActJudges Act
SubjectPreston, the Hon. Bruce M. ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY ** Supreme Court of British Columbia
PrecisResignation and granting of an annuity to the Hon. BRUCE M. PRESTON, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective April 13, 2010.
